com.samsung.openscp

Class Scp11KeyParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.openscp.Scp11KeyParams
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScpKeyParams

    public class Scp11KeyParams
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScpKeyParams
    SCP key parameters for performing SCP11 authentication.

    For SCP11b only keyRef and pkSdEcka are required. NOTE: this does not authenticate the off-card entity.

    For SCP11a and SCP11c the off-card entity CA key reference must be provided, as well as the off-card entity secret key and certificate chain.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Scp11KeyParams

        public Scp11KeyParams(KeyRef keyRef,
                      java.security.PublicKey pkSdEcka,
                      @Nullable
                      KeyRef oceKeyRef,
                      @Nullable
                      java.security.PrivateKey skOceEcka,
                      java.util.List<byte[]> certificates,
                      AesAlg sessionKeysAlg)
        SCP11a- & SCP11c-specific constructor
        Parameters:
        keyRef - the reference to the key set for associated SK.SD.ECKA
        pkSdEcka - public key of the SD used for key agreement (PK.SD.ECKA)
        oceKeyRef - the reference to the key set for associated SK.OCE.ECKA
        skOceEcka - private key of the OCE used for key agreement (SK.OCE.ECKA)
        certificates - OCE certificates in encoded form
        sessionKeysAlg - AES algorithm of session keys that will be generated
